report.title: Overdose (High Stress, Anxiety for Weeks)
report.author: movetheshadow
report.bodytext: A brief report due to having to write on my phone. /n /n Having tested the substance with a friend at low doses 50mg and then 100 approx and experiencing only threshold effects, mild stimulation and very slight ketamine style cev's. /n Decided the following night after a few beers to take 2 150mg doses a couple of hours apart. /n The result was a journey that literally blew my mind. /n Ketamine-like in nature, but very different all the same. /n I lost all sense of self, stretched and pulled across time and space, experiencing ever more absurd things, becoming everything and nothing. Alot of amnesia follows the experience. /n One situation that stood out was a period of extreme vibration, I was a highly electrified being, dragged up into a place that was inhabited by 2 being, it was a large and open space, they were smooth faceless and this was the only part of the trip in which I felt I had a form, I communicated with them through a form of energy conversion language, pushing and pulling. /n /n The majority of the trip was k-hole style travel. Seemed darker and more absurd, worm holes, becoming the suggestion of things that could happen. /n /n The entire journey was 5 hours in the 'm hole' the ever effects were pleasant closed eye visuals. /n /n On a serious note, the dose was too high, the substance is very hard on the central nervous system and left me with a permanent high stress and anxiety feeling which persisted relentlessly for weeks. /n /n Use with caution, the dose I took caused extreme pressure on mind and body. I won't be researching this chemical again. /n Much better alternatives are available. /n Methoxetamine took me deeper and darker than ketamine, felt like a 20 journey and I suggest extreme caution. /n /n Stay safe /n Peace frogs
